author: Ingrid Lunden
title: Facebook adds new ‘care’ emoji reactions on its main app and in Messenger
description: As a lot of us continue to stay indoors, Facebook has become a go-to platform for many people to check in with their friends, family and neighbours during the current coronavirus pandemic. Today, to give us another way of showing support and presence in its a…
